messages.title: Local schools budgets slashed
messages.content: Conservative cuts are starving schools of funding, risking our children's future. Ed Mayne will fight these cuts.

messages.title: Tory campaign in chaos and confusion
messages.content: Theresa May has thrown her own campaign into chaos and confusion. Ed Mayne argues Labour will stand up for older people and provide the security and dignity they deserve.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposes cuts to local schools and will fight to prevent turning schools into academies without local consent.
Against the Conservative proposals, promises to secure pensions with the 'Triple-Lock' system.

issues.brexitEurope: A fair and safe Brexit. Labour will seek to retain the benefits of the EU Single Market & Customs Union plus an EU Rights and Protections Bill.
issues.education: Local schools budgets slashed. Ed Mayne will fight these cuts.
issues.health: Take back central services to the NHS and integrate the social services.

housing.content: Build more homes for local families which they can afford to live in.

leaflet.personalStatement: For too long, Epsom's voice hasn't been heard in Westminster.
leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet promotes recycling with a 'Please recycle' message.
